message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $110. Is this something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I'm not quite comfortable with $105. I can do $108, which is the lowest I can go. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $106?

I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I can do $109, but that's as low as I can go. If you're willing to meet me at $109, I'll consider it a fair deal. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm still a bit short on my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $107?
I've already said I'll go as low as $109, Bob. I'm not willing to go any lower. If you're not willing to meet me at $109, I think we're at an impasse. I'm starting to consider other options.
I understand your position, but I'm really close to my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
